topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: The Great St Kilda Pier Crab Conspiracy
ideas.premise: Nana's saltwater stories reveal a secret society of St Kilda Pier crabs plotting to overthrow the penguins.
ideas.why_funny: Absurd scenario; Melbourne landmark; penguins vs crabs is inherently funny.

ideas.title: Nanna's Yarra Monster
ideas.premise: Nana's stories hint at a Loch Ness-style monster living in the Yarra River, fueled by discarded coffee cups.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Melbourne issue (coffee); monster in a mundane location is humorous.

ideas.title: The Brighton Bathing Box Buccaneers
ideas.premise: Nana recounts tales of miniature pirate battles fought between rival families using the Brighton Bathing Boxes as forts.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of cute bathing boxes with pirate violence is unexpected.

ideas.title: Flinders Street Station Time Warp
ideas.premise: Nana's saltwater stories suggest Flinders Street Station is a portal to different eras of Melbourne's beachside history.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable location; time travel shenanigans; historical Melbourne beach scenes.

ideas.title: The Spirit of the Westgate Bridge
ideas.premise: Nana claims the Westgate Bridge is haunted by the spirits of seagulls who demand tribute in the form of dropped hot chips.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Melbourne landmark; seagull greed; absurd haunting scenario.

ranking: The Great St Kilda Pier Crab Conspiracy
The Spirit of the Westgate Bridge
winner: The Great St Kilda Pier Crab Conspiracy
